H0.text: Radioactive is the designation for any nucleus that is unstable and decays spontaneously.

H1.text: Neutral is the term used to describe any nucleus that is unstable and decays spontaneously.

H2.text: Dull is the term used to describe any nucleus that is unstable and decays spontaneously.

H3.text: Magnetic is the description given to any nucleus that is unstable and decays spontaneously.

A4.text: A material containing unstable nuclei is considered radioactive.

A5.text: Radioactive decay is a random process at the level of single atoms.
